document.full_text: a clean-cut minnesota father of three is the new voice of insurer aflac, taking over the role of the acerbic quacking duck from the fired comedian gilbert gottfried.
document.title: aflac picks new duck voice to replace gilbert gottfried
lines_and_colors: a clean-cut minnesota father of three is the new voice of insurer aflac, taking over the role of the acerbic quacking duck from the fired comedian gilbert gottfried.
